attributes.action: David Cameron to stop claiming to speak for the whole country when he says "the whole country will be etc etc etc".
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron frequently says things such as "the whole country will blah, blah, blah", particularly in relation to the monarchy or some other elitist institution or the Olympics or our military presence in Afghanistan or any other issue.  DC does not know my mind on any issue so he should stop claiming to speak for me or anybody else for that matter.
